info.name: Black Ops II Themed Treyarch Cursor
info.description:
Just a little thingy I made. Has a cursor for links, too (free of charge!).
Works on all sites.

Black Ops II belongs to Treyarch.
Treyarch belongs to Treyarch.
Yadda yadda, I own nothing.
info.additionalInfo:
V2.O - Added a different cursor for links.
V1.0 - Initial release
